item.title: Raspberry Pi Jam 2020
item.author: jasmeet0915@gmail.com (Jasmeet Singh)
item.description: Gave a talk on how to set up and use Pi Clusters with a simple python example of calculating integrals with message passing between the different Raspberry Pi 3s
